items.name: Heartbound Loop
explicitMods: Minions have 10% increased Area of Effect
420 Physical Damage taken on Minion Death
flavourText: When the axe finally fell, Seryl shared his pain,
and the last thought that flickered through his
fading mind was her broken, shattered scream.

items.name: Skin of the Lords
explicitMods: You can only Socket Corrupted Gems in this item
flavourText: The Lords are chosen so carefully.
Only they may grace His flesh.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill gem. Once this gem reaches level 2 or above, will raise the level of supported gems. Cannot support skills that don't come from gems.
explicitMods: +3 to Level of Supported Skill Gems
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Launches shards of ice in rapid succession. After travelling a short distance they change to a second form, which moves much faster and pierces through enemies.
explicitMods: Second form has 600% increased Critical Strike Chance
Second form has +50% to Critical Strike Multiplier
Second form has 300% more Projectile Speed
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill that hits enemies.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have +150% to Critical Strike Multiplier
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.typeLine: Divergent Cast when Damage Taken Support
socketedItems.secDescrText: Each supported spell skill will track damage you take, and be triggered when the total damage taken reaches a threshold. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Vaal skills, channelling skills, and skills with a reservation cannot be triggered.
explicitMods: This Gem can only Support Skill Gems requiring Level 72 or lower
You cannot Cast Supported Triggerable Spells directly
Trigger Supported Spells when you take 3580 total Damage from Hits
Supported Skills require 23% reduced amount of Damage taken to Trigger
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

implicitMods: Inflict Cold Exposure on Hit, applying -16% to Cold Resistance
20% chance to Unnerve Enemies for 4 seconds on Hit

socketedItems.secDescrText: Lobs an exploding projectile near the targeted location, and extra projectiles toward enemies around you. The projectiles deal chaos damage based on your life and energy shield. Casting this spell damages you.
explicitMods: Deals 5% of your maximum Energy Shield as base Chaos Damage
Deals 12% of your maximum Life as base Chaos Damage
Take 40% of maximum Life and 25% of maximum Energy Shield as Chaos Damage
Fires extra Projectiles at up to 6 surrounding Enemies
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Summon Skeleton Warrior minions at the targeted location. They use a melee attack and die after a duration. If made aggressive, Skeleton Warriors will also dash towards nearby enemies.
explicitMods: Minions can't be Damaged for 2 seconds after being Summoned
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: The Annihilating Light
implicitMods: 7% chance to gain a Power Charge on Critical Strike
explicitMods: Deal Triple Damage with Elemental Skills

than the scintillating light of utter clarity.

socketedItems.secDescrText: An icy projectile which has a chance to freeze enemies it passes through. The projectile fades quickly, reducing damage and freezing chance until it dissipates.

Projectiles continuously lose Damage, up to 50% less Damage by the time they dissipate
Projectiles have 25% chance to Freeze, which is lost over the first quarter of their flight

implicitMods: You cannot be Cursed with Silence
Corrupted Blood cannot be inflicted on you
explicitMods: Adds 5 to 8 Cold Damage to Attacks
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an Abyssal Socket on an Item or into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.

items.name: Progenesis
enchantMods: Reused at the end of this Flask's effect
explicitMods: When Hit during effect, 25% of Life loss from Damage taken occurs over 4 seconds instead
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: They were bred in a cosmic ocean of raw creation.
Feasting and drinking of the milk of the mother,
they fought to the death for every last drop.

properties.name: Spell, Movement, Duration, Fire, Travel, Blink

socketedItems.secDescrText: Teleport to a location, damaging enemies and leaving a trail of burning ground in your wake. Shares a cooldown with other Blink skills.
explicitMods: Deals 1738.6 Base Fire Damage per second
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Engulfs you in magical fire that rapidly burns you and nearby enemies. Your spell damage is substantially increased while under this effect. The effect ends when you have 1 life remaining.

Deals 35% of your Maximum Life as Base Fire Damage per second
Deals 35% of your Maximum Energy Shield as Base Fire Damage per second
